au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=12m_central_apx7p5_JM2015
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(11200,0) # Drive guide to g3 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g3) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 7.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -47) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.5316) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.3168)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(44, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(44.0, 0) driveBsz(256)
